original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the mere name of the knowledge of right acceptance🔽is just a name.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of right acceptance thus:🔽For example, Householder, it is like the fact that the mere name of the dream of a magical person building a house

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is just a name.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gter rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gter rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the extent of the discovery of treasure in the dream of an illusory person.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the extent of the discovery of a treasure by an illusory person in a dream is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata fully knows that the extent of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of correct reception is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor zad pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor zad pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of correct reception.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the extent of the exhaustion of wealth by an illusory person in a dream is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata fully knows that the extent of the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of correct reception is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa @169b 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa @169b 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata also knows the cessation of the knowledge of the understanding of the truth of the path, which is the cessation of suffering.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor rab tu gtong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor rab tu gtong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: for example, the giving of wealth in a dream of an illusory person is just a name.🔽In the same way, the Tathāgata knows the cessation of the knowledge of the understanding of the truth of the path, which is the cessation of suffering, as just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the understanding of the truth of the path, which is the cessation of suffering.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gnas byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gnas byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the knowledge of the understanding of the truth of the path, which is the cessation of suffering, in a dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of what is and what is not possible just as it is, as a mere name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of what is and what is not possible as it really is.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang phrad par dga' ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang phrad par dga' ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam pa nas ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam gyi bar du rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ming tsam pa nas ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam gyi bar du rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: For example, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the mere name of the happiness of the union with a loved one in a dream of an illusory person, up to the mere name of the mere name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of what is and what is not possible as it really is.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the mere name of the separation from a loved one in a dream of an illusory person, up to the mere name of the mere name.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of what is and what is not possible as it really is.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: khyim bdag / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog pa shes @170a *//🔽pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog pa shes @170a *// pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the possible and the impossible, as merely names.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path, as merely names.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path, as merely names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gter rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gter rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path, as merely names.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path, as merely names.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path, as merely names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata also knows as it really is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path, as merely names.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chung ma la byams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chung ma la byams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the love of a magical man for his wife in a dream.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the love of a magical man for his wife in a dream is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata, who is skilled in the knowledge of causes and effects, knows that all causes and effects are just names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khye'u tshol ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khye'u tshol ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the arising of causes and effects.

original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te tshig thams cad la'ang rgya cher bya'o //
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te tshig thams cad la'ang rgya cher bya'o //
translated: For example, Householder, the search for a son in a dream of a magical man is just a name.🔽In the same way, the Tathāgata, who is skilled in the knowledge of causes and effects, knows that all causes and effects are just names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the cessation of causes and effects.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the cessation of the search for a son in a dream of a magical man is just a name.

original: dper na / sgyu @170b ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khye'u shi ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu @170b ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khye'u shi ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the following analogy: In a dream of an illusory person, there are as many deaths of children as there are.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, it is like the fact that the death of a child in a magical man’s dream is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'gog pa shes pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'gog pa shes pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows, as it really is, the cessation of the knowledge of cause and effect, and so on, up to the fact that it is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rgyu'i shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of cause and effect.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khye'u shi ba las smre sngags 'don pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khye'u shi ba las smre sngags 'don pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is as follows:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the lamentation of a magical man in a dream over the death of a child is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows, as it really is, the lamentation of a magical man in a dream over the death of a child, and so on, up to the fact that it is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of ripening.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na smig rgyu mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na smig rgyu mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: Homeless One,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata fully knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the maturation of karma, which is merely nominal.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the maturation of karma is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,🔽Homeless One,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na smig rgyu dag la chu'i lteng ka'i 'du shes ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na smig rgyu dag la chu'i lteng ka'i 'du shes ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: the extent of the perception of a mirage as a pond of water in a dream of a magical person is merely nominal.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //🔽khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs @171a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //🔽khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs @171a *//
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the maturation of karma, which is merely nominal, is as it really is.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the maturation of karma is as follows:

original: pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu'i lteng ka skam pa'i 'du shes ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu'i lteng ka skam pa'i 'du shes ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: He knows the cessation of the knowledge of the ripening of karma in this way:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the perception of the drying up of a mirage in a dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the ripening of karma is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na smig rgyu'i chu dang bral ba'i 'du shes ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na smig rgyu'i chu dang bral ba'i 'du shes ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows the path that leads to the attainment of the knowledge of the ripening of karma in this way:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the perception of the absence of water in a mirage in a dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro; ;khyim bdag /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro; ;khyim bdag /
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the path that leads to the attainment of the knowledge of the ripening of karma is just a name.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lam ston pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lam ston pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the teaching of the path in the dream of an illusory person is simply a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere is simply a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the origin of the path that leads everywhere.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu @171b ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na don la brtson pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu @171b ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na don la brtson pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the striving for the meaning in the dream of an illusory person is simply a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the path going everywhere is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path going everywhere like this:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul gzhan du 'gror med pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul gzhan du 'gror med pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the extent to which a dream of an illusory person does not go to another place is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path going everywhere is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the path going everywhere like this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs du mar don grub pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs du mar don grub pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, it is like the fact that the knowledge of the cessation of the path that goes everywhere, as much as there is, is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //🔽khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to // khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the cessation of the path that goes everywhere, as much as there is, is just a name.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khams du ma shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na khams du ma shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the various elements is as follows:

original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin @172a *//
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin @172a *//
translated: For example, Householder, it is like the fact that the knowledge of the various elements, as much as there is, is just a name.

original: gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the various elements, as much as there is, is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the various elements is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshon rtsi'i kha dog sna tshogs ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshon rtsi'i kha dog sna tshogs ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: just as the various colors of paints in a dream of an illusory person are merely names,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: in the same way, the Tathāgata, having realized the dharmas of the Tathāgata through perfect awakening, teaches the dharmas of the Tathāgata to be merely names.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata, the Saint, perfectly and completely awakened,

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: knows the cessation of the knowledge of the many elements like this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kha dog du ma'i bye brag shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kha dog du ma'i bye brag shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: just as the knowledge of the various colors in a dream of an illusory person is merely a name,🔽in the same way, the Tathāgata, the Saint, perfectly and completely awakened,

original: khyim bdag / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: knows the cessation of the knowledge of the many elements to be merely a name.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata, the Saint, perfectly and completely awakened,

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: knows the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of the many elements like this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshon rtsi mthong ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshon rtsi mthong ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: Householder, the Thus-Gone One knows that just as the consciousness of a person created by a magical illusion seeing various colors in a dream is merely a name,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way, the Thus-Gone One’s knowledge of the path that brings an end to the various elements of existence is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams @172b sna tshogs shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams @172b sna tshogs shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Thus-Gone One knows the knowledge of the various elements in the following way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na za ma tog gi nang nas gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na za ma tog gi nang nas gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: Householder, just as the various forms that emerge from a box in the dream of a person created by a magical illusion are merely names,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way, the Thus-Gone One knows that the knowledge of the various elements is merely a name.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: The Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the various elements.

original: dper na / rmi lam na sgyu ma mkhan rnam pa sna tshogs su rtse bas skye bo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / rmi lam na sgyu ma mkhan rnam pa sna tshogs su rtse bas skye bo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the various kinds of play of a magician in a dream delighting a crowd of people is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the various elements is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various elements.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'chi ba ston pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'chi ba ston pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the display of death in a dream of a magical person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata, having known that the knowledge of the various elements is just a name, and having known that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the various elements is just a name, and having known that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various elements is just a name, does not apprehend the knowledge of the various elements.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the variety of elements.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nad pa shi ba la thug pa la sman gyi rnam pa sbyin pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam @173a *//
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nad pa shi ba la thug pa la sman gyi rnam pa sbyin pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam @173a *//
translated: For example, householder, suppose a magical person in a dream gave medicine to a sick person who was at the point of death.

original: ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas khams sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the variety of elements to be just the same as a mere name.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the world.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bad kan byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bad kan byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, householder, suppose a magical person in a dream had phlegm.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: The Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the world to be just the same as a mere name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the world in this way:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dpyid kyi dus su rgyan gyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dpyid kyi dus su rgyan gyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is just as in a dream of a magical person, however many ornaments there are in the spring season,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: they are merely names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that however many there are of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the world, they are merely names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the world in this way:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dpyid kyi dus su me tog gi shing gcod pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dpyid kyi dus su me tog gi shing gcod pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: For example, it is just as in a dream of a magical person, however many there are of cutting down a flowering tree in the spring season, they are merely names. In the same way, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is that however many there are of the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the world, they are merely names.🔽For example, it is just as in a dream of a magical person, however many there are of the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the world, they are merely names. In the same way, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is that however many there are of the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the world, they are merely names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @173b ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @173b ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of the world.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: just as the various kinds of objects in a magical creation are merely names,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: so the Tathāgata understands as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of the world as merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the various kinds of devotion.🔽For example, just as the various kinds of dancers seen in a magical creation in a dream are merely names,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bro mkhan mthong ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bro mkhan mthong ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: so the Tathāgata understands as it really is the knowledge of the various kinds of devotion as merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the many kinds of higher interests.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the various inclinations of beings in this way:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi za ma tog ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi za ma tog ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, a magical creation of a man in a dream has as many containers of goods as there are.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //🔽khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to // khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the various inclinations of beings has as many names as there are.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various inclinations of beings in this way:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi za ma tog chag pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi za ma tog chag pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, a magical creation of a man in a dream has as many broken containers of goods as there are.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa @174a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa @174a *//
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various inclinations of beings has as many names as there are.

original: ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the extent of the world is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the various kinds of interest.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: He knows it as it is.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi rnam pa bsdus pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yo byad kyi rnam pa bsdus pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is just as when a magical being in a dream gathers together the various kinds of objects,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: they are just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the various kinds of interest is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of the various kinds of interest.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: He knows it as it is.🔽For example, it is just as when a magical being in a dream sees a great magical illusion,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mig 'phrul chen po mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mig 'phrul chen po mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: it is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata, up to mere names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the origin of the knowledge of the various kinds of devotion in this way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: in the dream of an illusory person, the various kinds of ornaments of a multitude of people are mere names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the origin of the various kinds of devotion is mere names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna @174b tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna @174b tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various kinds of devotion is this:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs zhig pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs zhig pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: in the dream of an illusory person, the destruction of a multitude of people is mere names.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: In the same way, up to: it is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, knowing as it really is the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the various inclinations,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: knows as it really is:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi dbugs 'byin pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi dbugs 'byin pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the relief of a multitude of people in a magical man’s dream is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows as it really is: the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the various inclinations is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, knowing as it really is the knowledge of the faculties,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: knows as it really is:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun rdzob kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun rdzob kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the aspects of the conventional in a magical man’s dream are merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the faculties also knows that all such things are mere names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the faculties is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshig la spyod pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin @175a *//
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshig la spyod pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin @175a *//
translated: For example, all the words used in the dream of an illusory person are mere names.

original: gshegs pas dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gshegs pas dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the faculties also knows that all such things are mere names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculties is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshig 'gal ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshig 'gal ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, all the words used in the dream of an illusory person are mere names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculties is just the same as that knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculties.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculties is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun rdzob thob pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun rdzob thob pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: just as the attainment of the conventional in a dream of an illusory person is just a name, likewise the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculties is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the powers is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma shes pa'i dpung gi sbyor ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma shes pa'i dpung gi sbyor ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: just as the knowledge of the illusory army in a dream of an illusory person is just a name,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the powers, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de @175b bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de @175b bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the powers is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma kun tu spyod pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma kun tu spyod pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the experience of an illusory person in a dream is just a name.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: In the same way, up to it is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the powers is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma zhig pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma zhig pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the dissolution of an illusory person in a dream is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the powers is just the same as that—he knows it is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the powers is as follows:

analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sgyu ma shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas stobs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa gang yin pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the powers is just the same as that—he knows it is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

translated: It is like this:

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na brtson 'grus rtsom pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the diligence of the illusory person in a dream is just the same as that—he knows it is merely a name.

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas @176a *// brtson 'grus shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the knowledge of diligence is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the arising of diligence in this way:

analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na don mngon par brjod pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: the knowledge of the expression of meaning in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the knowledge of the arising of diligence is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of diligence in this way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na brtson 'grus nyams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: the loss of diligence in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: It is just a name.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: In the same way,

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of striving.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na snyed pa thob pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na snyed pa thob pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is just as follows:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the attainment of a dream by an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of striving is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rim pa shes @176b pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rim pa shes @176b pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bye brag tu khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /

analyzed: ming tsam ste /

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the afflictions in this way:

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of the treatment for the eye disease of cataracts in a dream is just a mere name.

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s cognition of the arising of the knowledge of purification is just the same as that, knowing it to be a mere name.🔽“Householder,

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam @180b du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam @180b du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the knowledge of the absence of clouds in a dream where there is wind is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of purification as merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the stability of the Dharma.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: as merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the various kinds of higher cognitions, just as it is, as merely a name.

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the arising of the knowledge of the various kinds of higher cognitions, just as it is,

analyzed: dper na / rmi lam na rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu dbang bskur pa'i yi byad shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the arising of the knowledge of the various kinds of higher cognitions, just as it is,

original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes @181a *//
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the cessation of the knowledge of the various kinds of higher cognitions, just as it is,🔽as follows:

original: pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata fully understands the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various elements of existence.

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / rmi lam na rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu gzhon nu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: is merely a name,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way, the Tathāgata fully understands that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various elements of existence is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully understands the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the various elements of existence.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rmi lam na dbang bskur ba grub pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Just as the coronation of a king anointed on the crown of his head, who has lost his kingdom in a dream,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: is merely a name,

translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the stability of the Tathāgata’s mind to be just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the past of the Tathāgata to be just a name.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bgad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dag rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
