original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, the extent of the recollection of the laughter, joy, play, and enjoyment of an illusory person in a dream is just a name.

original: ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the past of the Tathāgata to be just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin @181b gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin @181b gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of the past of the Tathāgata to be just a name.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is just as follows:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bro mkhan 'dus pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bro mkhan 'dus pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: For example, Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the arising of the past, as many as there are, to be merely names.🔽For example, Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the arising of the past, as many as there are, to be merely names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nye du dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nye du dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: For example, Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the arising of the past, as many as there are, to be merely names.🔽For example, Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the arising of the past, as many as there are, to be merely names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the arising of the past, as many as there are, to be merely names.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nye du dang mi ldan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nye du dang mi ldan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the knowledge of the dream of a conjured person that he has no relatives.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the cessation of the path that is the knowledge of past abodes of the Tathāgata as merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gsheg pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gsheg pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of past abodes like this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lha'i gnas rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba'i rigs rjes su dran pa @182a *//🔽dang / longs spyod rjes su dran pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa rjes su dran pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa rjes su dran pa dang / mtsho dang 'brel ba rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lha'i gnas rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba'i rigs rjes su dran pa @182a *// dang / longs spyod rjes su dran pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa rjes su dran pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa rjes su dran pa dang / mtsho dang 'brel ba rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: just as the memory of the abode of the gods in a dream of an illusory person, the memory of the family into which he was born,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: the memory of his enjoyments, the memory of meeting with friends, the memory of meeting with enemies, and the memory of his association with a lake are merely names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas kyi khams shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas kyi khams shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the past reaches as far back as names and labels.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of past abodes is as follows:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang / rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa'i rgyu dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa'i rgyu dang / chu dang 'bral ba'i rgyu ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang / rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa'i rgyu dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa'i rgyu dang / chu dang 'bral ba'i rgyu ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, just as the causes for the appearance of a magical person in a dream—the causes for his dwelling in a place, the causes for his dwelling in a family, the causes for meeting with friends, the causes for meeting with enemies, and the causes for separation from loved ones—

original: ming tsam ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ming tsam ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: are merely names, in the same way, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of past abodes reaches as far as names and labels.🔽“

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, perfectly enlightened and fully awakened, knows in this way the cessation of the knowledge of the recollection of past lives.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang /
translated: For example, it is like the causes of the dream of a magical person, which are free from the causes of dwelling in a place, free from the causes of dwelling in a family, free from the causes of dwelling in friends, free from the causes of dwelling in enemies,

original: mtsho la gnas @182b pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //🔽khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mtsho la gnas @182b pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to // khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and free from the causes of dwelling in a lake, all of which are merely names.🔽In the same way, the Tathāgata knows in this way that the cessation of the knowledge of the recollection of past lives is merely a name.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, perfectly enlightened and fully awakened, knows in this way the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the recollection of past lives.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs la mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs la mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the skillful means of an illusory person in a dream.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, the Thus-Gone One knows as it truly is: ‘The extent of the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of past lives of the Thus-Gone One is merely a label.’

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Thus-Gone One knows the knowledge of the future as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye ba'i rigs la 'jug pa dang / skye ba'i yul du 'jug pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad par 'jug pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad par 'jug pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes par 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye ba'i rigs la 'jug pa dang / skye ba'i yul du 'jug pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad par 'jug pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad par 'jug pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes par 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: the extent of the knowledge of the family into which a magical person will be born in a dream, the country into which he will be born, the meeting with friends, the meeting with enemies, and the knowledge of the ocean is merely a label.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the future is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the future, knowledge of the arising of the future, is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul du gnas par 'jug @183a *//
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul du gnas par 'jug @183a *//
translated: it is just as if a person in a dream were to know the causes of entering a place in a dream,🔽know the causes of entering a family,🔽know the causes of entering into contact with friends,🔽know the causes of entering into contact with enemies,

original: pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs la 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa'i 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs la 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa'i 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: and know the causes of entering into knowing a lake.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: The causes of entering into knowing a lake are just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the past knows the past to be just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the future is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'jug pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'jug pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the causes and conditions of the arising of a dream of a magical person are just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the future is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the future is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs yang dag par grub pa shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yang dag par grub pa shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba yang dag par grub pa shes pa @183b dang /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs yang dag par grub pa shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yang dag par grub pa shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba yang dag par grub pa shes pa @183b dang /
translated: For example, it is like the knowledge of the concentration of a person living in a dream in an illusory city, the knowledge of the family in which one will be born, the knowledge of meeting with friends, the knowledge of being separated from enemies,

original: mtsho yongs su shes pa yang dag par grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mtsho yongs su shes pa yang dag par grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: and the knowledge of the complete accomplishment of the knowledge of the lake—

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: all of them are mere names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the future is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of death is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na 'chi ba shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang bral ba shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba shes pa dang / mtsho dang bral ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na 'chi ba shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang bral ba shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba shes pa dang / mtsho dang bral ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, just as in the case of a magical person, the knowledge of death in a dream, the knowledge of separation from friends, the knowledge of separation from relatives, and the knowledge of separation from a lake are mere names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of death, however much it may be, is just mere names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of death is as follows.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'chi ba shes pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / yul na gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / yul ngan par gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang /🔽mtsho yongs su shes pa bsags pa'i rgyu ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'chi ba shes pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / yul na gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / yul ngan par gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mtsho yongs su shes pa bsags pa'i rgyu ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, the accumulation of causes for the knowledge of death of an illusory person in a dream, the accumulation of causes for living in a good place, the accumulation of causes for living in a bad place, the accumulation of causes for meeting with friends, the accumulation of causes for meeting with enemies,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: and the accumulation of causes for knowing the ocean are all just names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid @184a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid @184a *//
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of death is just a name.

original: kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In this way, he knows it thoroughly.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows the cessation of the knowledge of death in this way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang // mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mtsho yongs su shes pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang // mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mtsho yongs su shes pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the causes for the illusory person’s dreams, for the causes for being in a place of friends, for the causes for being in a place of enemies, and for the causes for knowing the lake are all just names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of death, to the same extent that it exists, is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path the cessation of the knowledge of death is also fully known.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa yid la byung ba dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yid la byung ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa yid la byung ba dang / mtsho la gnas pa yid la byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa yid la byung ba dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yid la byung ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa yid la byung ba dang / mtsho la gnas pa yid la byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, a magical person in a dream may think of a place, think of meeting a friend, think of meeting an enemy, or think of being on the water.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: All of these are merely names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Thus-Gone One knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of death is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba zhes ba 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba zhes ba 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Householder, the Thus-Gone One knows what is called birth.

original: dper @184b na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me dang mar me shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper @184b na; sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me dang mar me shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, a magical person in a dream may think of a lamp or the knowledge of a lamp.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: All of these are merely names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the extent of the knowledge of birth is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of birth like this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me dang mar me'i bya ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me dang mar me'i bya ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the extent of the knowledge of the lamp and the function of the lamp in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the extent of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of birth is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of birth like this:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me'i bya ba nyams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me'i bya ba nyams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the extent of the failure of the function of the lamp in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.🔽In the same way, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows that the extent of the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of birth is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the extinction of the knowledge of birth is simply this knowledge of birth, and so on, up to the knowledge of the extinction of the knowledge of old age and death is simply this knowledge of old age and death.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the extinction of the knowledge of birth is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is simply this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bya ba shes pa 'gog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @185a *//
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bya ba shes pa 'gog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @185a *//
translated: just as the knowledge of the skillful means of the cessation of the knowledge of activity in the dream of an illusory person is simply a name,

original: ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the extinction of the knowledge of birth is simply this knowledge of birth, and so on, up to the knowledge of the path that leads to the extinction of the knowledge of old age and death is simply this knowledge of old age and death.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the extinction of the knowledge of birth is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is simply this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the consciousness of a great river in the dream of an illusory person.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Homeless One, the Tathāgata fully understands the knowledge of the afflictions of desire as they really are, just as they are.🔽For example,

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Homeless One, the Tathāgata fully understands the knowledge of the afflictions of desire as they really are, just as they are.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na char chen po 'bab pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na char chen po 'bab pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,🔽Homeless One, the Tathāgata fully understands the knowledge of the afflictions of desire as they really are, just as they are.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Homeless One, the Tathāgata fully understands the knowledge of the afflictions of desire as they really are, just as they are.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the defilements of desire.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po rnam par bskams pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po rnam par bskams pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the knowledge of the drying up of a great river in a dream of an illusory person.

original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen @185b to; ;khyim bdag /
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen @185b to; ;khyim bdag /
translated: It is just a name.🔽In the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the defilements of desire as just a name.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the defilements of desire.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po rnam par skams pa shes shing mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po rnam par skams pa shes shing mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the knowledge of the drying up of a great river in a dream of an illusory person.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: It is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the defilement of desire is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te; 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the defilement of existence is as follows:

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rgyal srid thob pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of the attainment of a kingdom by an illusory person in a dream is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the defilement of existence is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the defilement of existence is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rgyal srid thob pa'i srid pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rgyal srid thob pa'i srid pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: the existence of the attainment of a kingdom by an illusory person in a dream is just a name.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: It is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the truth of the arising of the contaminants of existence is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa @186a *//
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa @186a *//
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the contaminants of existence is just a name.

analyzed: 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows it just as it is.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rgyal srid nyams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /

original: ming tsam ste /🔽de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shas pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shas pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the contaminants of existence is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the outflows that are views:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na sprul gdug pa'i za ma tog rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na sprul gdug pa'i za ma tog rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: just as the knowledge of the snake’s box in the dark of night in a dream of an illusory person is merely a name,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that the knowledge of the outflows that are views is merely a name.

analyzed: khyim bdag ;de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the outflows that are views:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sprul gdug pa'i za ma tog la dga' ba'i 'dun pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sprul gdug pa'i za ma tog la dga' ba'i 'dun pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /

analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: just as the knowledge of the desire for the snake’s box in the dark of night in a dream of an illusory person is merely a name,🔽in the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that the knowledge of the arising of the outflows that are views is merely a name.

translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the origin of the contaminants of views is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te; 'di lta ste /

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o //
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the contaminants of views is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the contaminants of ignorance is as follows:

analyzed: dper na; dmus long gi rmi lam na gzugs mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: Just as in a dream of a blind man, whatever sound of water there is is just a name,

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid @187a *//

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the contaminants of ignorance:

analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / dmus long skom pa'i rmi lam na btung ba rnam par bskams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way, the Tathāgata understands as it really is that the knowledge of the cessation of the contaminants of ignorance is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, understands as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the contaminants of ignorance:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / dmus long gi rmi lam na mun pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / dmus long gi rmi lam na mun pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the defilement of ignorance is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of the abandonment of desire, anger, and ignorance in a dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of exhaustion is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin @187b gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin @187b gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of exhaustion in the following way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, it is like the knowledge of the instructions of a spiritual friend in the dream of an illusory person.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the knowledge of the instructions of a spiritual friend in the dream of an illusory person is simply a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the cessation of suffering and the knowledge of the arising of suffering are simply names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /

original: dper na / dmus long gi rmi lam na nor chud gzan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / dmus long gi rmi lam na nor chud gzan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the knowledge of the loss of wealth in the dream of a blind person is simply a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the cessation of suffering and the knowledge of the arising of suffering are simply names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of suffering as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / dmus long gi rmi lam na snang ba thob ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / dmus long gi rmi lam na snang ba thob ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the extent of the consciousness that obtains appearances in the dream of a blind person is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mi @188a *//

translated: It is like this.

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na zad pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab
translated: For example, Householder, just as the knowledge of exhaustion and non-arising of an illusory person in a dream is merely a name,🔽in the same way, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of non-arising is merely a name.

original: tu mkhyen to /
analyzed: tu mkhyen to /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of non-arising like this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
