original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor ma rnyed pa'i rnyed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor ma rnyed pa'i rnyed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, just as the knowledge of the acquisition of wealth not acquired in a dream of an illusory person is merely a name,🔽in the same way, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of non-arising is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of non-arising like this:

original: ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, knows that as it is.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor rab tu nyams pa'i mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor rab tu nyams pa'i mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of the birth of a person who has lost all his wealth in a dream of a magical person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa @188b 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du da ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa @188b 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du da ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of non-arising is just a name.

original: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows the Tathāgata’s knowledge of fearlessness in this way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa thams cad khong du chud pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa thams cad khong du chud pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of fearlessness through comprehending all knowledge in a dream of a magical person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of fearlessness is just a name.

original: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of fearlessness in that householder.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos yongs su dris pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos yongs su dris pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the knowledge of the questions about the Dharma in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata fully knows that the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of fearlessness is just a name.

original: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata fully knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of fearlessness in that householder.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos ji ltar bzung ba rnams kyi rab tu 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos ji ltar bzung ba rnams kyi rab tu 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: for example, the knowledge of the fear of the things that are grasped in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu @189a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu @189a *//
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows, as it really is, that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of fearlessness is just a name.

original: mkhyen to // khyim bdag /
analyzed: mkhyen to // khyim bdag /
translated: Householder!

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata knows, as it really is, the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of fearlessness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'gog pa'i chos rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'gog pa'i chos rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the recollection of the Dharma of cessation in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows, as it really is, that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of fearlessness is just a name.🔽Householder!

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata knows, as it really is, the knowledge of the analytical knowledges.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rmi lam na brag ca'i sgra brnyan gyi spobs pa don rnam par rig par byed pa nyid kyi sgra ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / rmi lam na brag ca'i sgra brnyan gyi spobs pa don rnam par rig par byed pa nyid kyi sgra ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: in a dream, the extent of the sound of the confidence of an echo is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that the extent of the knowledge of the discernments is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the discernment of the way things are has an arising that he fully knows.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: dper na / rmi lam na brag ca'i don shes te; don shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: dper na / rmi lam na brag ca'i don shes te; don shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: For example, in a dream, the knowledge of the meaning of an echo is the knowledge of the arising of the meaning.

original: don shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: don shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: It is the knowledge of the cessation of the meaning.

original: don shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes /🔽chos shes te chos shes pa kun @189b 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: don shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes / chos shes te chos shes pa kun @189b 'byung ba shes /
translated: It is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the meaning.

original: chos shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: chos shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: It is the knowledge of phenomena. It is the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of phenomena.🔽It is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of phenomena.

original: chos shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes /
analyzed: chos shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes /
translated: It is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of phenomena.

original: nges pa'i tshig shes te /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig shes te /
translated: It is the knowledge of definitions.

original: nges pa'i tshig shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of etymological definitions,

original: nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of etymological definitions,

original: nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes /🔽spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes te /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes te /
translated: the knowledge of the path the cessation of the knowledge of etymological definitions,🔽the knowledge of the analytical knowledge of eloquence,

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /🔽spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: the knowledge of the origin of the analytical knowledge of eloquence,🔽the knowledge of the cessation of the analytical knowledge of eloquence,

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: and the knowledge of the path the cessation of the analytical knowledge of eloquence.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: All of these are simply names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges is simply a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag dag nas snang ba dang bral ba'i bar ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag dag nas snang ba dang bral ba'i bar ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste /
translated: For example,🔽Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.🔽For example,🔽Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.🔽For example,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag @190a *//
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag @190a *//
translated: For example,

original: par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.🔽For example,🔽Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na snang ba dang bral ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na snang ba dang bral ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,🔽Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.🔽For example,🔽Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering, as merely nominal.🔽For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the path leading to the cessation of the knowledge of the analytical knowledges, up to the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the extinction of suffering

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the discernments is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of characteristics in the following way:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun brjod pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun brjod pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of clairvoyance in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of characteristics is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of characteristics in the following way:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul ba mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul ba mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the creation of an emanation by the Tathāgata is just a name.🔽Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of characteristics is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the origin of the truth of the knowledge of defining characteristics is simply a matter of names, and so on up to:

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the truth of the knowledge of defining characteristics is as follows:

original: 'di lta @190b ste; dper na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa shes pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta @190b ste; dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa shes pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the emanations that are free from knowledge is simply a matter of names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the truth of the knowledge of defining characteristics is simply a matter of names, and so on up to:

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the truth of the knowledge of defining characteristics is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa thabs mkhas shing shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa thabs mkhas shing shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the emanations that are skillful and knowledgeable is simply a matter of names.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: It is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of characteristics, that it is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa shes pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa shes pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa shes pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa shes pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of abiding in this way:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of abiding in love, the knowledge of abiding in compassion, the knowledge of abiding in joy, and the knowledge of abiding in equanimity of a person conjured by magic in a dream are just names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of abiding, that it is just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di @191a *//🔽ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di @191a *// ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the understanding of abodes is as follows:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, just as the understanding of the knowledge abiding in love, the understanding of the knowledge abiding in compassion, the understanding of the knowledge abiding in joy, and the understanding of the knowledge abiding in equanimity in the dream of an illusory person are simply names,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pas gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pas gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in the same way the Tathāgata fully knows that the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the understanding of abodes is simply a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the understanding of abodes is as follows:🔽For example, just as the cessation of the understanding of the knowledge abiding in love, the cessation of the understanding of the knowledge abiding in compassion, the cessation of the understanding of the knowledge abiding in joy, and the cessation of the understanding of the knowledge abiding in equanimity in the dream of an illusory person are simply names,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa 'gog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa 'gog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of abiding, to the amount that is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of abiding, to the amount that is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the path that leads to the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of abiding.

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the skillful means of the illusory person in a dream, to the amount that is merely a name.

original: de bzhin @191b du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin @191b du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of abiding, to the amount that is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata, aware of this, knows the Tathāgata’s cognition of faculties as it really is.

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /🔽ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni / ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, just as the faculties of faith, perseverance, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom of a magical person in a dream are simply nominal,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: so the Tathāgata knows, as it really is, that the Tathāgata’s cognition of faculties is simply nominal.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata, aware of this, knows the Tathāgata’s cognition of the arising of faculties as it really is.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example, just as the arising of the faculties of faith, perseverance, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom of a magical person in a dream are simply nominal,

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nga rgyal gyi shes pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni; ming tsam ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nga rgyal gyi shes pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni; ming tsam ste /
translated: For example,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the faculties, that it is merely a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the faculties.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,🔽the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the faculties, that it is merely a name.

translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the extent of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the faculties, that it is merely a name.🔽“

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lam rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lam rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the path the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of faculties like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, it is just as if there were the mere names of however many paths to discovering a dream for an illusory person.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows the mere names of however many paths to the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of faculties like this:

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of physical actions like this:🔽For example, it is just as if there were the mere names of however many knowledges of shaking the body for an illusory person in a dream.

translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows the mere names of however many knowledges of physical actions like this:

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bya ba la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example, just as the extent of the engagement in activity in the dream of an illusory person is merely a name,

original: ming @192b tsam ste; de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na til mar gyi mar me bus pa zad cing zhi ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the understanding of the cessation of the knowledge of the body is as follows:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, just as the extent of the knowledge of the exhaustion and pacification of an illusory person’s dream of a sesame-oil lamp is merely a name,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of physical activity is also just a name.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of physical activity.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus kyi las yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus kyi las yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of physical activity in the dream of an illusory person is just a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata knows that the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of physical activity is also just a name.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dag gi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas dag gi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of physical activity.

original: 'di lta ste; dper na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste; dper na /
translated: It is like this:

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na brdzun du smra ba'am /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na brdzun du smra ba'am /
translated: For example, in the dream of an illusory person, lying is just a name.

original: brdzun du smra ba las ldog pa'am /🔽phra ma'i ngag gam /
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba las ldog pa'am / phra ma'i ngag gam /
translated: “The words ‘refraining from lying’

analyzed: phra ma'i ngag las ldog pa'am / tshig rtsub po'i @193a *// ngag gam / tshig rtsub po'i ngag las ldog pa'am / tshig kyal ba'am /

original: tshig kyal pa las ldog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: tshig kyal pa las ldog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: or ‘refraining from idle talk’

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: are mere names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: In the same way, the Tathāgata knows that all knowledge of speech is mere names.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows the sources of the knowledge of speech as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshad ma bstan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na tshad ma bstan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: For example,

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: the knowledge of the demonstration of valid cognition in a dream of an illusory person is mere names.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the origin of speech is simply a designation.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of speech is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
translated: It is like this:

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: For example, the knowledge of the cessation of speech in the dream of an illusory person is simply a designation.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of speech is simply a designation.

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of speech is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu @193b skyes bu'i rmi lam na zos pa dang / ma zos pa yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu @193b skyes bu'i rmi lam na zos pa dang / ma zos pa yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni /

analyzed: ming tsam ste /
translated: To that extent, it is merely a name.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to //

original: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di lta ste; dper na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di lta ste; dper na /

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bar snang la ri mo 'bri ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bar snang la ri mo 'bri ba ji snyed pa nyid ni /
